div.p: We had to get an SOE licence, go on a course, a written course, two I think; I did my CCTV course, yeah a general security guard course
to get the licences. The CCTV course was quite interesting because you have to get the general terminology like IC1 male, IC3 male...
You basically do role playing like one person is going to act suspiciously on the camera, did you get his clothes, his age, do any other features stick out?
I had to do a Health and Safety course, a First Aid course, I enjoyed them all for different reasons, it taught you how to deal with things
in different environments. I enjoyed the learning aspect really, no there wasnâ€™t really any hard part, not that I can think of.
